remarks: The opposite Yoneda embedding at an object of ` C ` is a functor from ` C ` to Set, also known as the covariant Hom functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oyoncl.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
oyoncl.y $e |- Y = ( Yon ` O ) $.
oyoncl.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
oyoncl.s $e |- S = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
oyoncl.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
oyoncl.h $e |- ( ph -> ran ( Homf ` C ) C_ U ) $.
oyon1cl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
oyon1cl.p $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
oyon1cl $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` Y ) ` X ) e. ( C Func S ) ) $.
